name: adjust_volume
description: Adjusts the current volume by a specified percentage.

by.description: The amount in percentage points to adjust the volume. This can be a positive value to increase volume or a negative value to decrease it, with the final result always constrained between 0 and 100.

setting.description: The specific volume setting to adjust. If set to `None` or `"UNSPECIFIED"`, the adjustment applies to all volume settings. Valid options include "ALARM", "CALL", "MEDIA", "NOTIFICATION", "RING", and "UNSPECIFIED".

name: get
description: Retrieves the current value of a device setting.

setting_type str.description: Specifies the device setting to retrieve. This must be one of the following string values: "AIRPLANE_MODE", "ALARM_VOLUME", "AUTO_ROTATE", "BATTERY", "BATTERY_SAVER", "BLUETOOTH", "CALL_VOLUME", "DO_NOT_DISTURB", "FLASHLIGHT", "HOT_SPOT", "MEDIA_VOLUME", "NETWORK", "NFC", "NIGHT_MODE", "NOTIFICATION_VOLUME", "RING_VOLUME", "TALK_BACK", "VOLUME", "VIBRATION", or "WIFI".

name: get_app_notification_status
description: Retrieves the current notification status for a specified application.

app_name.description: The name of the application for which to retrieve notification settings.

name: get_device_insights
description: Generates device insights based on the user's current device state.

device_state_type.description: Specifies the type of device state for which to retrieve insights, with valid options being `"UNCATEGORIZED"`, `"BATTERY"`, or `"STORAGE"`. If this parameter is omitted or set to `"UNCATEGORIZED"`, general device insights are returned.

name: get_installed_apps
description: Retrieves a list of all applications installed on the device. The returned information for each application specifically excludes its notification settings.

name: mute
description: Mutes the audio output of the device.

setting.description: Specifies the volume setting to mute. To mute all settings, omit this parameter or provide "UNSPECIFIED". Valid options include "ALARM", "CALL", "MEDIA", "NOTIFICATION", "RING", and "UNSPECIFIED".

Specifies the toggleable device setting to turn off. It must be one of the following string values: "AIRPLANE_MODE", "AUTO_ROTATE", "BATTERY_SAVER", "BLUETOOTH", "DO_NOT_DISTURB", "FLASHLIGHT", "HOT_SPOT", "NETWORK", "NFC", "NIGHT_MODE", "TALK_BACK", "VIBRATION", or "WIFI".

name: on
description: Enables a specific setting on a device.

setting.description: Specifies the toggleable device setting to turn on. Valid values are: "AIRPLANE_MODE", "AUTO_ROTATE", "BATTERY_SAVER", "BLUETOOTH", "DO_NOT_DISTURB", "FLASHLIGHT", "HOT_SPOT", "NETWORK", "NFC", "NIGHT_MODE", "TALK_BACK", "VIBRATION", and "WIFI".

name: open
description: Opens the settings page corresponding to a specific setting type.

setting_type.description: Specifies the device setting to open, which must be a string corresponding to a `DeviceSettingType` enum value. If this parameter is set to `UNSPECIFIED` or is omitted, the general device settings page is opened; use `UNSPECIFIED` for generic user requests like "open settings". Valid values are: `UNSPECIFIED`, `ACCESSIBILITY`, `ACCOUNT`, `AIRPLANE_MODE`, `ALARM_VOLUME`, `APPLICATION`, `APP_DATA_USAGE`, `AUTO_ROTATE`, `BARD`, `BATTERY`, `BATTERY_SAVER`, `BIOMETRIC`, `BLUETOOTH`, `BLUETOOTH_PAIRING`, `BRIGHTNESS`, `CALL_VOLUME`, `CAST`, `DARK_THEME`, `DATA_SAVER`, `DATE_TIME`, `DEVELOPER_OPTION`, `DEVICE_INFO`, `DISPLAY`, `DO_NOT_DISTURB`, `GEMINI`, `GOOGLE_ASSISTANT`, `HOT_SPOT`, `INTERNAL_STORAGE`, `LANGUAGE`, `LOCATION`, `LOCK_SCREEN`, `MEDIA_VOLUME`, `NETWORK`, `NFC`, `NIGHT_MODE`, `NOTIFICATION_VOLUME`, `RING_VOLUME`, `TALK_BACK`, `VOLUME`, `VIBRATION`, `WIFI`.

name: set_app_notification_status
description: Sets the notification status for a specific application.

app_name.description: Specifies the name of the application whose notification status will be modified.

notifications.description: Specifies the desired notification state, which must be set to either "on" or "off".

name: set_volume
description: Sets the audio volume to a specified percentage.

to.description: The target volume level, specified as a percentage from 0 to 100.

setting.description: Specifies the volume stream to adjust. Valid options include "ALARM", "CALL", "MEDIA", "NOTIFICATION", "RING", and "UNSPECIFIED". If this parameter is omitted or set to "UNSPECIFIED", all volume settings are adjusted simultaneously.

name: unmute
description: Sets the device volume to a default level, which unmutes the device if it is muted.

setting.description: Specifies the volume setting to unmute, which must be "ALARM", "CALL", "MEDIA", "NOTIFICATION", "RING", or "UNSPECIFIED". If this parameter is `None` or set to "UNSPECIFIED", all volume settings are unmuted. When unmuted, settings are restored to predefined levels (e.g., ALARM=50, CALL=70, RING=80); unmuting all sets a general volume level of 65.
